text: @RealJamesWoods “Bill Gates and Barack Obama released a docuseries called Pandemic just before the Wuhan virus was ‘discovered.’ The docuseries pushed the need for the Gates Foundation to receive funding to carry on research to prevent pandemic.” #coincidence https://t.co/0d0IybH3KD
